Key Match Events: Darius Garland led the Cavs with 27 points, six assists, three rebounds and three steals
Donovan Mitchell and Co. improved their record to 10-0
Jonathan Kuminga came off the bench to lead the Dubs with 21 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers dominated the visiting Golden State Warriors in the first half
The hosts led 83-42 after the first 24 minutes passed
The disparity in 3-point shooting allowed the Cavaliers to grab a stranglehold on the game
Others: The Dubs, which had the most efficient defense entering the matchup, couldn't slow down the Cavaliers
Steve Kerr did not insert Curry in the fourth quarter
